lest.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: in order to make sure that something will not happen
lest.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She turned away from the window lest anyone see them.
lest.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: used to show that someone is afraid or worried that a particular thing might happen
lest.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: He paused, afraid lest he say too much.
She worried lest he should tell someone what had happened.
